page.title: 02Petworth Rural Area 05000122
page.content: This area is bounded on the north by the A272 where "Hilliers" - a 14th century farm called "Cox Bottom" - is now the home of the Agent for the Leconfield Estate. Beyond this, Brinksole Heath consists mostly of heath and rough woodland and is bordered by the "Goannah Meadows", which stretch back to Petworth. Entry to the Heath is between two lodges "Gog and Magog", so called because the statues of these mystical giants, now on the main gates of Petworth House, once stood here.
